title: Jesus Goes to Hell on Vacation!
description: When God asks for Satan's help in finally removing the Trumps from power, he makes a request: in their absence, he wants the Queen of Hell, Jimmy David Davidson, to watch over his only son. Jesus Christ is nothing like Jimmy expects, and he makes it his mission to help the Lord with the one thing he wants most: to lose his virginity.Blasphemy! 2!: Jesus Goes to Hell on Vacation!
author: T.J. Klune
